question: On Wednesday, Lily wants to exercise for four times the amount of time he did on Tuesday and Monday combined. On Monday he exercised for 12 minutes. On Tuesday he exercised for 31 minutes. How many minutes does he have to exercise on Wednesday to reach his goal?
answer:
On Monday and Tuesday he exercised a total of 43 minutes because 12 + 31 = <<12+31=43>>43
On Wednesday he has to exercise for 172 minutes because 43*4 = <<43*4=172>>172
#### 172
